title: Question 11
prompt: ___________________. Swimming can strengthen many muscles in the body. It can also increase endurance and overall health. Indoor and outdoor pools are available so that swimmers can exercise throughout the year.
description: Read the paragraph.  Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: The best topic sentence for this paragraph is, “There are many benefits to swimming.”  The other sentences in the paragraph give details about the benefits of swimming. The other choices give specific details about swimming but don’t give a topic sentence that relates to all the other sentences in the paragraph.
